file.name: openapi.yml
file.content:
openapi: "3.0.3"
info:
  version: 1.0.0
  title: Pixelframe
servers:
  - url: http://pixelframe.local/v1
paths:
  /configuration:
    delete:
      operationId: deleteConfiguration
      summary: Reset configuration
      tags:
        - configuration
      responses:
        "204":
          description: No content
        default:
          description: Unexpected error
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/Error"

  /configuration/basic:
    get:
      operationId: getBasicConfiguration
      summary: Get basic configuration
      tags:
        - configuration
      responses:
        "200":
          description: Basic configuration
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/BasicConfiguration"
        default:
          description: Unexpected error
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/Error"
    patch:
      operationId: patchBasicConfiguration
      summary: Update basic configuration
      tags:
        - configuration
      requestBody:
        required: true
        content:
          "application/json":
            schema:
              $ref: "#/components/schemas/UpdateBasicConfiguration"
      responses:
        "200":
          description: Basic configuration
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/BasicConfiguration"
        "400":
          description: Bad request
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/Error"
        default:
          description: Unexpected error
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/Error"

  /configuration/wifi:
    get:
      operationId: getWifiConfiguration
      summary: Get WiFi configuration
      tags:
        - configuration
      responses:
        "200":
          description: WiFi configuration
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/WifiConfiguration"
        default:
          description: Unexpected error
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/Error"
    put:
      operationId: putWifiConfiguration
      summary: Update WiFi configuration
      tags:
        - configuration
      requestBody:
        required: true
        content:
          "application/json":
            schema:
              $ref: "#/components/schemas/UpdateWifiConfiguration"
      responses:
        "200":
          description: Wifi configuration
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/WifiConfiguration"
        "400":
          description: Bad request
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/Error"
        default:
          description: Unexpected error
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/Error"

  /environment/wifis:
    get:
      operationId: getEnvironmentWifis
      summary: Get list of available WiFis
      tags:
        - environment
      responses:
        "200":
          description: Available Wifis
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/EnvironmentWifiList"
        default:
          description: Unexpected error
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/Error"

  /images:
    get:
      operationId: getImages
      summary: Get list of images
      tags:
        - images
      responses:
        "200":
          description: Available images
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/ImagesList"
        default:
          description: Unexpected error
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/Error"
    post:
      operationId: postImages
      summary: Add new image
      tags:
        - images
      requestBody:
        content:
          multipart/form-data:
            schema:
              $ref: "#/components/schemas/UploadImage"
      responses:
        "200":
          description: Image
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/Image"
        "400":
          description: Bad request
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/Error"
        default:
          description: Unexpected error
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/Error"

  /images/{name}:
    delete:
      operationId: deleteImage
      summary: Delete image
      tags:
        - images
      parameters:
        - name: name
          in: path
          required: true
          description: The name of the image to delete
          schema:
            type: string
      responses:
        "204":
          description: No content
        "404":
          description: Not found
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/Error"
        default:
          description: Unexpected error
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/Error"
    get:
      operationId: getImage
      summary: Get image
      tags:
        - images
      parameters:
        - name: name
          in: path
          required: true
          description: The name of the image to delete
          schema:
            type: string
      responses:
        "204":
          description: No content
        "404":
          description: Not found
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/Error"
        default:
          description: Unexpected error
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/Error"

components:
  schemas:
    BasicConfiguration:
      type: object
      required:
        - brightness
        - timezone
      properties:
        brightness:
          type: integer
          minimum: 0
          maximum: 255
        timezone:
          type: string

    UpdateBasicConfiguration:
      type: object
      properties:
        brightness:
          type: integer
          minimum: 0
          maximum: 255
        timezone:
          type: string

    WifiConfiguration:
      type: object
      required:
        - ssid
      properties:
        ssid:
          type: string

    UpdateWifiConfiguration:
      type: object
      required:
        - ssid
        - password
      properties:
        ssid:
          type: string
        password:
          type: string

    EnvironmentWifi:
      type: object
      required:
        - ssid
        - signalStrength
      properties:
        ssid:
          type: string
        signalStrength:
          type: integer

    EnvironmentWifiList:
      type: array
      items:
        $ref: "#/components/schemas/EnvironmentWifi"

    Image:
      type: object
      required:
        - id
        - url
        - fileType
      properties:
        type:
          type: string
        size:
          type: string
        name:
          type: string

    ImagesList:
      type: array
      items:
        $ref: "#/components/schemas/Image"

    UploadImage:
      type: object
      required:
        - fileType
        - file
      properties:
        fileType:
          type: string
        file:
          type: string
          format: binary

    Error:
      type: object
      required:
        - code
        - message
      properties:
        code:
          type: integer
        message:
          type: string
